text.0: hǣl scēawedon. Cp. Tacitus, Germania, c. x: 'auspicia . . . observant' (Par.  § 10). See Grimm D. M. 944ff. (1128ff.), 77ff. (94ff.), iii 324ff. (1639 ff.); Müllenhoff L 9.14.1.222ff.; Gummere G. O. 467; Liebermann L 9.10.2.574. That the omens which are watched by the men are favorable is understood. Cf. ESt. xliv 123. [Tr.1 137, & Ed.; Siev. xxix 322; Sed., MLR. v 286, & Ed.]
